comment: по клику на пустой трон Чорды

languages.text: Символ власти Инцендии пустует. Его священная механическая начинка искорежена мстительной толпой.
The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.
languages.original_text: Символ власти Инцендии пустует. Его священная механическая начинка искорежена мстительной толпой.

traits.locale_text: The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.
The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.

The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅力量的象征已经被拆解得空空如也。原本神圣的机械内脏，早已被渴望复仇的暴徒们破坏殆尽。
languages.original_text: The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅力量的象征已经被拆解得空空如也。原本神圣的机械内脏，早已被渴望复仇的暴徒们破坏殆尽。

languages.text: インセンディアの力の象徴は空だ。その神聖な機械の内部は復讐に燃える群衆により、曲げられ、ぐちゃぐちゃにされていた。
languages.original_text: The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.

traits.locale_text: インセンディアの力の象徴は空だ。その神聖な機械の内部は復讐に燃える群衆により、曲げられ、ぐちゃぐちゃにされていた。

languages.text: El símbolo del poder de Incendia está vacío. Sus sagradas entrañas mecánicas han sido retorcidas por la horda vengativa.
languages.original_text: The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.

traits.locale_text: El símbolo del poder de Incendia está vacío. Sus sagradas entrañas mecánicas han sido retorcidas por la horda vengativa.

languages.text: Das Symbol von Incendias Macht steht leer. Sein heiliges mechanisches Innenleben wurde von dem rachsüchtigen Mob verwüstet und zerstört.
languages.original_text: The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.

traits.locale_text: Das Symbol von Incendias Macht steht leer. Sein heiliges mechanisches Innenleben wurde von dem rachsüchtigen Mob verwüstet und zerstört.

languages.text: Le symbole du pouvoir d'Incendia est vide. Ses entrailles mécaniques sacrées ont été purement et simplement détruites par la foule en colère.
languages.original_text: The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.

traits.locale_text: Le symbole du pouvoir d'Incendia est vide. Ses entrailles mécaniques sacrées ont été purement et simplement détruites par la foule en colère.

languages.text: İncendia'nın güç sembolü, boşta duruyor. Kutsal, mekanik iç kısımları, öfkeli kalabalık tarafından bozulmuş ve parçalanmış.
languages.original_text: The symbol of Incendia's power is vacant. Its sacred mechanical innards have been twisted and mangled by the vengeful mob.

traits.locale_text: İncendia'nın güç sembolü boşta duruyor. Kutsal, mekanik iç kısımları, öfkeli kalabalık tarafından bozulmuş ve parçalanmış.
